Description.Text:
Property Location
A stay at Twelve Centennial Park Hotel places you in the heart of Atlanta, walking distance from New American Shakespeare Tavern and Museum of Design Atlanta. This 4-star aparthotel is within close proximity of Atlanta Civic Center and AmericasMart.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 102 air-conditioned rooms featuring kitchens with full-sized refrigerators/freezers and stovetops. Your room comes with a pillowtop bed, and all rooms are furnished with sofa beds. Rooms have private balconies. Wired and wireless Internet access is complimentary, while 37-inch plasma televisions with satellite programming provide entertainment.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Enjoy a range of recreational amenities, including an outdoor pool, a fitness center, and a seasonal outdoor pool. Additional features include complimentary wireless Internet access, concierge services, and wedding services.

Dining
Grab a bite to eat at the aparthotel's restaurant, which features a bar, or stay in and take advantage of 24-hour room service. Relax with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge or a poolside bar. Breakfast is available for a fee.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include a 24-hour business center, express check-out, and complimentary newspapers in the lobby. Planning an event in Atlanta? This aparthotel has 5800 square feet (539 square meters) of space consisting of a conference center and conference space.


Check-in time starts at 3 PM Check-out time is Noon
Grab a bite to eat at the aparthotel's restaurant, which features a bar, or stay in and take advantage of 24-hour room service. Relax with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge or a poolside bar. Breakfast is available for a fee.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

A stay at Twelve Centennial Park Hotel places you in the heart of Atlanta, walking distance from New American Shakespeare Tavern and Museum of Design Atlanta. This 4-star aparthotel is within close proximity of Atlanta Civic Center and AmericasMart.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

New American Shakespeare Tavern - 0.4 km / 0.2 mi
Museum of Design Atlanta - 0.4 km / 0.3 mi
Atlanta Civic Center - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi
AmericasMart - 0.6 km / 0.3 mi
World of Coca Cola - 0.6 km / 0.3 mi
The Children's Museum of Atlanta - 0.6 km / 0.4 mi
Georgia Aquarium - 0.7 km / 0.4 mi
Centennial Olympic Park - 0.8 km / 0.5 mi
Tabernacle - 0.8 km / 0.5 mi
Fox Theatre - 0.8 km / 0.5 mi
Margaret Mitchell Square - 0.9 km / 0.6 mi
Rialto Center for the Performing Arts - 1 km / 0.6 mi
High Museum of Art at Georgia-Pacific Center - 1 km / 0.6 mi
CNN Center - 1.1 km / 0.7 mi
Georgia World Congress Center - 1.1 km / 0.7 mi

The nearest airports are:
Atlanta, GA (ATL-Hartsfield-Jackson Atlanta Intl.) - 14.9 km / 9.2 mi
Atlanta, GA (PDK-DeKalb-Peachtree) - 15 km / 9.3 mi

The preferred airport for Twelve Centennial Park Hotel is Atlanta, GA (ATL-Hartsfield-Jackson Atlanta Intl.).

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
